title: in my promos to gold :D
body:
frst time ever being this high in elo. going into gold promos... currently in champ select , i say hi, first thing i get is "stfu or i afk" .-. wish me luck :D

progression: game 1: went 12-0 team  kept calm didnt rage at eachother, turned it around 12-15 got baron and won in 
20 minutes :D lets see game 2
game 2: enemy  master yi carried o.0 could 1v4 since level 9
game 3 : everyone lost lane and enemy got quad then baron....team ff :*( i can feel the dream of gold slipping away. ( ps locked in annie mid first pick then fourth pick locks in heimer mid when we need a bot lane :/ )
game 4: went nid jungle. got early lead, enemy caught up. 40 min game they took baron but we aced them they ff. so close Dx now for the last game. 2 wins 2 losses. need to win!!!!!

GOT GOLD BABY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Aw :( I was really rooting for you.
i have to win the next two in a row :/ im gona play some norms for awhile and do  my two in like 6 hours. if i get gold ill remember u  :)

Oo you still have a chance! hehe
Good luck :D

Oh LOL AHAHAHAHAHA
I added someone else who was ranking up and for some reason thought it was you and checked and he's silver 1 so that explains why I thought you lost.
But you won!
hell yeah!
nice job :D
Oh gosh. I hope you don't get trolled in your promos. Good luck!
if i get trolled ill cry :*( ive seen people search others up, see theyre in promos, and troll :/
I find it quite sad for the people that do it. In the end, they're just wasting their time, as well as demoting themselves.
ur faith was not in vayne!!! i got gold!!!<3
good luck in getting into advanced bronze
lol dont doubt it , probably is x) but thanks
